content: these adorable amigurumi turtles are the perfect valentine s gift because they are part kawaii animal part rose that s right this sweet critter has a beautiful bloomed rose where its shell would be this perfect hybrid of plant and stuffed animal is sure to be a hit with your valentine it s also perfect for anyone who loves flowers and gardening in addition to cute handmade things what a unique gift and decor idea this pattern calls for sizes 3 25 mm and 5 mm crochet hooks and/or 8 mm and 10 mm crochet hooks depending on size you are making about 170 yds of medium weight yarn regular size and/or 170 yds of super bulky weight yarn plus 5-10 yds of medium weight yarn large size 1 pair of 10 mm safety eyes regular size and fiberfill stuffing the difficulty level for this pattern is easy size small size about 7 inches in length from head to tail large size about 13 inches from head to tail exact gauge is not essential to this pattern happy crocheting
